original_text: Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow, saith the Lord of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 말하노라 칼아 깨어서 내 목자, 내 짝 된 자를 치라 목자를 치면 양이 흩어지려니와 작은 자들 위에는 내가 내 손을 드리우리라

sentences.original_text: and against the man that is my fellow
and the sheep shall be scattered
and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 작은 자들에게 내 손을 돌리리라
